package.name: kuka_lwr4_resources_armhf

description.p: Shared configuration data, 3D models and launch files for KUKA LWR4+ manipulators.
This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files that are shared between different KUKA LWR4 robot support packages within the ROS Industrial program.

package.author: Risto Kojcev (Center for MicroBio Robotics, Italian Institute of Technology)
package.maintainer: Risto Kojcev (Center for MicroBio Robotics, Italian Institute of Technology)
